channel.title: 317 Framework Speed Run - Twitch Stream
channel.description:
[url=http://twitch.tv/sinisoul]Check out the stream here[/url] [url=http://github.com/Hadyn/speedrun]Check out the repository here[/url]
[b]Done for today![/b]
The stream starts at 7 PM Mountain Time and will continue until 3 AM Mountain Time. Occasional breaks will occur, but it will not be interrupted.
After the stream is finished I will link the broadcast. I will talk about practices I uphold while programming, and history of the protocols and other information people may find interesting. I will also incorporate facets of Andrew Gowers original scripting system and how it is essential to take into consideration when designing modern frameworks.
Edit: I streamed for 4 hours straight and was experiencing some fatigue. I will be back soon to continue this for another 4 hours just to see how far it gets, then obviously 8 more increments until the basics are done :)
[b]Goals[/b]
[ul][li]Game protocol[/li] [li]Player updating[/li] [li]Walking[/li][/ul]
[b]Conditions[/b]
[ul][li]All code will be written from scratch, minus essential libraries/code that would be reinventing the wheel[/li] [li]Any questions on chat will be answered, these can include questions about protocols, Java specific questions.[/li] [li]All code will be pushed to github occasionally[/li][/ul]
